summary.title: Welcome!
content: Thank you for visiting my interactive resume. There's quite a few things to look at, so let's get started.
This site was built using React.js through the Next.js framework.  It was styled using SCSS and Storybook.js.
There are several ways you can interact with the site.  The most simple interaction is that you can browse my 'Achievements' here in this panel.
You can also press the 'Y' key or the button in the bar to close and reopen this panel to gain access to the screen behind the panel.
You may try and use skills on the action bar, but you might need to target something first..
You can also use the chat box or icons in the bar to interact with the character.  Give it a try!
Thanks for visiting, I hope you enjoy your experience!
